name: Attack on Hong Kong

name: Gorgon Katana

name: Mounted Dragon
text: Guard. [star] Forced Response: After Mounted Dragon attacks you, discard 1 card from the top of the encounter deck. If a [[hand]] minion is discarded this way, put that minion into play engaged with you.

name: The Circle
text: The Circle is under attack. Everyone is going to defend it. When Revealed: Each player must choose: Find an ally and put it facedown under The Circle or exhaust your identity. When defeated: Each player chooses up to 2 cards in their discard pile and shuffle them into their deck. (Discard each card attached to the Circle)

name: Untold
text: They are everywhere. Hinder 2[per_hero]. When Revealed: The first player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a [[hand]] minion and puts it into play engaged with them. Shuffle the encounter deck. [hazard]

name: Ambush
text: When Revealed: Discard an ally or a [[persona ]]support you control. If no cards were discarded this way, this card gains surge. —————————————————— [star] Boost: Exhaust an ally or a [[persona]] support you control.

name: Duel
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Flip to hero form. The villain attacks you with +1 ATK. Do not give the villain a boost card for this activation. When Revealed (hero): The villain attacks you. Other characters cannot defend against this attack.
